Mendokusai

Tartarus

Can Jonny Actually Read Challenge 2.0

26 Jan 2020

In 2018 I read no books whatsoever, and so last year I set myself the lofty goal of reading 52 in 52 weeks. Obviously, I failed, managing a measly 6, but at least that was an infinite improvement. This year I have decided to set a goal that is a little more achievable - to read a single book. The only problem is that that book is David Foster Wallace’s legendary epic, Infinite Jest. At 1079 pages long, it may well compromise more than the sum of the 6 books that I read last year, and will most likely make for a much denser read. Still, that is the point of settings oneself a challenge right?

Look forward to my review sometime around December…
